00028 #ifndef STOCHASTICOXYGENBASEDCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_

00030 
00031 #include "SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00032 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00033 
00041 class StochasticOxygenBasedCellCycleModel : public SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel
00042 {
00043 private:
00044 
00045     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00046     template<class Archive>
00047     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00048     {
00049         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel>(*this);
00050 
00051         RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00052         archive & *p_gen;
00053         archive & p_gen;
00054 
00055         archive & mStochasticG2Duration;
00056     }
00057 
00061     double mStochasticG2Duration;
00062 
00068     void GenerateStochasticG2Duration();
00069 
00070 public:
00071 
00075     StochasticOxygenBasedCellCycleModel();
00076 
00080     void InitialiseDaughterCell();
00081 
00085     void Initialise();
00086 
00090     void ResetForDivision();
00091 
00095     double GetG2Duration();
00096 
00101     AbstractCellCycleModel* CreateCellCycleModel();
00102 
00108     virtual void OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00109 };
00110 
00111 // Declare identifier for the serializer
00112 #include "SerializationExportWrapper.hpp"
